faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about appointments, services, and patient support.

q1.question: How can I book an appointment?
q1.answer: You can book an appointment online through our website, by calling us directly, or by visiting our clinic during working hours.

q2.question: Do I need a referral to see a specialist?
q2.answer: No referral is needed for most of our services. However, some insurance providers may require a referral for coverage purposes.

q3.question: What should I bring to my first visit?
q3.answer: Please bring your ID, any medical records, a list of medications you're taking, and your insurance information if applicable.

q4.question: Can I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
q4.answer: Yes. You can reschedule or cancel your appointment up to 24 hours in advance by calling our front desk or using our online system.

q5.question: Do you accept walk-ins?
q5.answer: We recommend booking in advance, but we do accept walk-ins based on availability. Priority is given to those with appointments.

q6.question: Which insurance plans do you accept?
q6.answer: We accept most major insurance providers. Please contact us or check our insurance page for a full list of accepted plans.

departments.title: Departments
departments.description: Explore our specialized departments providing expert care and advanced treatments tailored to patient needs.

cardiology.title: Cardiology
cardiology.subtitle: Our cardiology department offers cutting-edge diagnostics and treatments for all types of heart conditions.
cardiology.content: We specialize in non-invasive and interventional cardiology, treating patients with heart disease, arrhythmias, hypertension, and more. Our team of experts ensures personalized care using the latest medical technology and evidence-based protocols.

neurology.title: Neurology
neurology.subtitle: Advanced care for disorders of the brain, spinal cord, and nervous system.
neurology.content: We diagnose and manage conditions such as epilepsy, stroke, Parkinson’s disease, and multiple sclerosis. Our multidisciplinary approach ensures patients receive comprehensive care, from diagnostics to rehabilitation and support therapy.

hepatology.title: Hepatology
hepatology.subtitle: Expert care for liver, gallbladder, and pancreatic diseases.
hepatology.content: We offer evaluation and management of hepatitis, cirrhosis, fatty liver disease, and other hepatic conditions. Our team collaborates with gastroenterology and oncology units to provide integrated care for complex liver disorders.

pediatrics.title: Pediatrics
pediatrics.subtitle: Dedicated to the health and well-being of infants, children, and adolescents.
pediatrics.content: Our pediatricians provide routine checkups, vaccinations, developmental screenings, and treatment for common childhood illnesses. We emphasize a family-centered approach to care and early intervention for long-term health benefits.

ophthalmology.title: Ophthalmologists
ophthalmology.subtitle: Providing comprehensive eye care, from vision correction to complex surgeries.
ophthalmology.content: We treat cataracts, glaucoma, macular degeneration, and other ocular diseases. With advanced diagnostic tools and surgical expertise, our ophthalmology team ensures patients receive clear vision and healthy eyes at every stage of life.
